messages.subject: Leaving for the conference
messages.msgSnippet: I m leaving for a week and might or might not get to check back, but I did change the list s settings so that new members posts don t have to be screened.
messages.messageBody:
I'm leaving for a week and might or might not get to check back, but I did
change the list's settings so that new members' posts don't have to be screened.
That means you might get spam.

IF THERE IS SPAM, let it go by without comment, please. Comments just end
up jamming the list up worse. Thanks. There might not be any; if there is,
I hope it's not too irritating.

Someone on another list deposited a pack of lies, and I have refuted the one
that was about one of my kids here:
http://sandradodd.com/detractors

Okay, back to the other things! Have a good week.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
